body_text: I think this has the opposite meaning as the name and the code. The description alone makes me think that a value of true would enroll new users and false would not.
body: I think this has the opposite meaning as the name and the code. The description alone makes me think that a value of `true` would enroll new users and `false` would not.
body_html: I think this has the opposite meaning as the name and the code. The description alone makes me think that a value of true would enroll new users and false would not.
